query_context: top link tracking tools to measure marketing distribution channel performance for onboarding (MMP platforms)

layer_1_structural_framework.consensus_intent: Clearly define the main topic and promise of the content.
layer_1_structural_framework.optimized_pattern_template: The [Number] Best MMPs (Mobile Measurement Partners) for [Use Case/Year]

layer_1_structural_framework.content_requirement: Must include key entities: MMP, mobile attribution, link tracking, marketing channels
layer_1_structural_framework.consensus_intent: Provide an executive summary defining MMPs and their importance.
Provide detailed reviews of individual tools.
layer_1_structural_framework.optimized_pattern_template: H2: [Tool Name] followed by P: [Description], UL: [Features/Pros/Cons]

layer_1_structural_framework.consensus_intent: Allow for quick comparison of key features across tools.
layer_1_structural_framework.content_requirement: Must compare at least 3 key features (e.g., Pricing, Key Integration, Unique Feature).

MMP (Mobile Measurement Partner).primary_definition: A third-party platform that tracks and attributes mobile app installs and post-install events to specific marketing campaigns and channels.

Google Tag Manager.primary_definition: A system for managing marketing and analytics tags on websites and mobile apps, often used in conjunction with MMPs.

high_value_attributes.data_point: Detected via tracking code 'GTM-M4LRWT7N' on a ranking page.

Segwise.primary_definition: An analytics platform identified as a publisher of content relevant to the MMP and analytics query context.

mandatory_inclusions: A curated list of specific, named MMP tools.
Specific examples or brief case studies for tool applications.
Clear definitions for core concepts like 'MMP', 'attribution', and 'link tracking'.
A section on 'Key Features to Consider' when choosing an MMP.
negative_constraints: Avoid generic content that lacks specific tool names, features, or data.
Avoid low entity density; the topic requires naming multiple products and technologies.
Do not publish without a clear H1 and logical H2/H3 heading structure.
